title: xwz
author: xwz
content: I've attended several trading competitions this year, as captain or attendee. Welcome to ask me anything about CEX trading competition and win double from exchange and market

comments.author: akaleung023
comments.body: Actually, what is KCGI? I am new to crypto and would like to learn more.

comments.author: akaleung023
comments.body: I am new to crypto, i found that there are several competitions on the bitget website, not sure which one should I join, any advice?

comments.author: Potato Chips
comments.body: But how do we know you're not trolling us? I suggest coming up with supporting evidence.Because frankly speaking, anyone can create an account and claim big things not to mention, a lot of scammers are circling around in the crypto community hence it makes sense to be cautious.

comments.author: Hamza2424
comments.body: Quote from: xwz on August 24, 2023, 09:28:29 AMI've attended several trading competitions this year, as captain or attendee. Welcome to ask me anything about CEX trading competition and win double from exchange and market Quite confidential.. I would like to hear about a few facts (shreds of evidence) about your achievements/portfolio, just for authenticity means. Quote from: akaleung023 on August 24, 2023, 01:18:52 PMActually, what is KCGI? I am new to crypto and would like to learn more.  Welcome on board to the forum. Weird what you've asked.Quote from: akaleung023 on August 25, 2023, 07:28:57 AMI am new to crypto, i found that there are several competitions on the bitget website, not sure which one should I join, any advice?Hmm, seems like you've took it seriously and made some efforts on the topic and now trying to join the completion not an ordinary sports competition a trading competition.You've asked for the advice sure, Please learn basics of the trading before making any investment move even some seniors avoid trading competitions because its not our race its the race of the capital and you are new I would love if you learn and then  after a reasonable experience participate in the trading competition and end up wining it.. Best of Luck.Quote from: Potato Chips on August 25, 2023, 07:17:20 PMBut how do we know you're not trolling us? I suggest coming up with supporting evidence.Because frankly speaking, anyone can create an account and claim big things not to mention, a lot of scammers are circling around in the crypto community hence it makes sense to be cautious.Supported      , take me in the count of this OP.
